Bibliographic References: PP, no. 159; PPSupp, no. 238; Schauenburg. loc. cit, p. 165, fig. 6
Imagery Description: (a) Seated halfNon Sepcifieddraped woman, holding cista and egg, (b) young satyr bending forward over right foot, which rests upon a pointed amphora, and holding phiale in right hand and thyrsus in left.
